sourcesContent:
import { ArrowDropDown, Notifications, SearchRounded } from '@material-ui/icons' import React, {useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navbar.scss' const Navbar = () => { const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = useState(false) const mounted = useRef(false) useEffect(() => { mounted.current = true return () => { mounted.current = false } }) if(mounted.current) { window.onscroll = () => { setIsScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true) return () => window.onscroll = null } } return (
Home TV Shows Movies New & Popular My List
KIDS
Settings Logout
) } export default Navbar
